title: SLAVERY AND FREEDOM A Conversation With Orlando Patterson (1)
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: The first part of a three part series:  I'm joined by the great historical sociologist Orlando Patterson to discuss the nature and history of slavery and how this lead to the creation of the "strange and un-innocent" value of freedom.  In the first part we discuss Professor Patterson's background, his account of slavery and the history of slavery in the earliest peoples.
itunes:subtitle: The first part of a three part series:  I'm joineâ€¦
description: The first part of a three part series:  I'm joined by the great historical sociologist Orlando Patterson to discuss the nature and history of slavery and how this lead to the creation of the "strange and un-innocent" value of freedom.  In the first part we discuss Professor Patterson's background, his account of slavery and the history of slavery in the earliest peoples.
